ap.name: All Pick
ap.en: Each player is allowed to pick a hero from any tavern.

ar.name: All Random
ar.en: Each player is given a random hero from any tavern.

rd.name: Random Draft
rd.en: 20 random heroes from any tavern are selected and players take turns picking from them.

sd.name: Single Draft
sd.en: Each player chooses from one of 3 individual random heroes.

cd.name: Captains Draft
cd.en: 24 random heroes are selected. Then Blue and Pink take turns banning heroes, then picking heroes. Then the players on each team pick from their team's heroes.

cm.name: Captains Mode
cm.en: Blue and Pink take turns banning heroes, then take turns picking heroes. These heroes are then chosen by members of their team.

em.name: Easy Mode
em.en: Towers are weaker, and players get extra gold and experience.

dm.name: Death Match
dm.en: When you die you are given a new hero. The game can end normally, or when one team reaches a certain amount of deaths. lives # can be used to set life limit, and -nd to remove respawn timer along with this mode.

rs.name: Random Side
rs.en: Places each team on a random side.

du.name: Duplicate
du.en: More than one of each hero can be played.

sp.name: Shuffle Players
sp.en: Randomly switches around players from each team.

xl.name: Extended League
xl.en: Both Sides will take turns picking heroes. Each team captain can pick 4 heroes to remove from the pool.

om.name: Only Mid
om.en: Only the middle lane is used.

sc.name: Super Creeps
sc.en: Powerful creeps will spawn every 10 minutes.

lm.name: League Mode
lm.en: Both Sides will take turns picking heroes.

mm.name: Mirror Mode
mm.en: After one minute, each team will have the same heroes.

tr.name: Team Random
tr.en: You will be given a random hero from your taverns.

vr.name: Vote Random
vr.en: You will be given a random hero from the voted groupset.

rv.name: Reverse
rv.en: You pick a hero for your opponent.

oi.name: Observer Info
oi.en: Disables extra information display for observers.

sh.name: Same Hero
sh.en: All players will be given the hero that Blue has.

id.name: Item Drop
id.en: When you die, a random inventory slot will drop an item.

nt.name: No Top
nt.en: The top lane is not used.

nm.name: No Mid
nm.en: The middle lane is not used.

nb.name: No Bot
nb.en: The bottom lane is not used.

pm.name: Pooling Mode
pm.en: All items can be used by other players.

mi.name: Mini Heroes
mi.en: All heroes are half normal size.

er.name: Experimental Runes
er.en: Uses an experimental rune spawning system.

so.name: Switch On
so.en: Allows use of the -switch command. Leavers items can be unlocked by -unlock command when this mode is activated.

zm.name: Zoom mode
zm.en: Observers will view the game from a zoomed out state.

cp.name: Capture Point
cp.en: Specific areas appear at 10 minute mark. Capturing them grants various bonus auras.

wtf.name: Fun mode
wtf.en: Spells have no cooldown or manacost.

ts.name: Terrain Snow
ts.en: This transforms the current terrain into a snow terrain. This is a very experimental mechanism and is still very much a ‘Work in Progress’ in the visuals department.
